task.title: Starting a meeting by using click to meet
task.shortdesc: You can start a meeting from within the chat window. This action is called click to meet. By using this feature, you can start meetings that you own during a chat session.

step.cmd: At the bottom of the screen, click the meet icon () .
step.info: A list of meetings that you own opens.
Sametime sends the link for the meeting preceded with Meet me here: meeting_name to your chat partners.

step.cmd: Click the link and then Start to begin the meeting.
